description: This file demonstrates how to use the TwilioTools with the Agno framework, including setting up an agent with specific instructions and sending an SMS message.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent in the Agno framework configured with instructions, model, tools, and display options.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used within the agent.

classes.name: TwilioTools
classes.description: Provides methods to interact with Twilio services such as sending SMS and checking message history.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response or message generated by the agent, in this case, to send an SMS.
